entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
